column4: i have a problem with setting up samba, i cant see my lubuntu computer on windows 7 network
when you using \\<IP>, does it work?
is server your lubuntu or windows machine?
is that some device like NIS and not computer?
i dont know, my windows machine is Cobra and lubuntu is Rocket
do you have SMB enabled in the firewall on lubuntu?
i can be NIS because no computer has name MYNAME on my network
my iptables is empty, should i add samba there?
when you opening \\<lubuntu's IP address> from win7, what's happening
i get prompt for user name and password
had you created samba accounts for windows users on lubuntu machine?
yes it work, i can see my shared files, but why i dont see lubuntu machine in network panel
can be some problems because i have this line in smb.conf: name resolve order = bcast host wins
no, because it's client setting, you're a server now
